sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A gleaning in Gods harvest Foure choyce handfuls; the gate to happinesse. Wounded saviour. Epicures caution. Generation of seekers. By the late judicious divine, Henry Ramsden, sometime preacher in London. Ramsden, Henry, d. 1638. Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
[24], 56, 67-231, [3] p.
Printed [by John Dawson] for J[ohn] D[awson] and R. M[abb] and are to bee sold by Thomas Slater, at the Swan in Duck-lane, London : 1639.
Editor's dedication signed: Iohn Goodwine. Printer's and publishers' names from STC. The words "Gate to .. seekers." are bracketed together on the title page. Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: [par.]-2[par.]⁴ A-2F⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[24], 56, 67-231, [3] p.
Printed [by John Dawson] for J[ohn] D[awson] and R. M[abb] and are to bee sold by Thomas Slater, at the Swan in Duck-lane, London : 1639.
Editor's dedication signed: Iohn Goodwine. Printer's and publishers' names from STC. The words "Gate to .. seekers." are bracketed together on the title page. Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: [par.]-2[par.]⁴ A-2F⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

J[ohn] D[awson]
